1: Sincere prayers receive attentive, just response.
2: Justice arises from impartial eyes that see equality.
3: I speak with integrity from a proven, steadfast heart.
4: I live by wise words and walk safe paths.
5: I walk steadily along the path of integrity.
6: I call and receive attentive listening.
7: Trust brings faithful love and strong protection.
8: Remain cherished and protected within steadfast, sheltering care.
9: Protective care surrounds and secures from every side.
10: Speak humbly with an open, compassionate heart
11: Lift your eyes upward, paths open and progress continues
12: Cultivate alertness and foresight in hidden places.
13: Protective justice delivers life and restores peace.
14: Abundance today equips children and enriches future generations.
15: I live with integrity and wake fulfilled, reflecting perfect likeness.
